00046 #ifndef _RGBC_
00047 class RGBc {
00048 public:
00049   Byte r, g, b;
00050     
00051   void set(Byte r,Byte g,Byte b) {this->r=r;this->g=g;this->b=b;};
00052     
00053   RGBc( void ) {};
00054   RGBc( Byte r, Byte g, Byte b ) { set( r, g, b ); };
00055 };
00056 #define _RGBC_
00057 #endif

00186 /************ A string type for us to use **********/
00187 /*  typedef char  GLUI_String[300]; */
00188 class GLUI_String
00189 {
00190 public:
00191   char string[300];
00192 
00193   char &operator[]( int i ) {
00194     return string[i];
00195   }
00196 
00197   operator char*() { return (char*) &string[0]; };
00198   /*    operator void*() { return (void*) &string[0]; }; */
00199 
00200   GLUI_String( void ) {
00201     string[0] = '\0';
00202   }
00203 
00204   GLUI_String( char *text ) {
00205     strcpy( string, text );
00206   }
00207 };

00254 typedef void (*GLUI_Update_CB) (int id);
00255 typedef void (*Int1_CB)        (int);

00262 /************************************************************/
00263 /*                                                          */
00264 /*          Base class, for hierarchical relationships      */
00265 /*                                                          */
00266 /************************************************************/
00267 
00268 class GLUI_Node {
00269 protected:
00270   GLUI_Node *parent_node;
00271   GLUI_Node *child_head;
00272   GLUI_Node *child_tail;
00273   GLUI_Node *next_sibling;
00274   GLUI_Node *prev_sibling;
00275 
00276 public:
00277   GLUI_Node *first_sibling( void );
00278   GLUI_Node *last_sibling( void );
00279   GLUI_Node *prev( void );
00280   GLUI_Node *next( void );
00281   GLUI_Node *first_child( void )   { return child_head; };
00282   GLUI_Node *last_child( void )    { return child_tail; };
00283   GLUI_Node *parent(void)          { return parent_node; };
00284 
00285   void      link_this_to_parent_last( GLUI_Node *parent );
00286   void      link_this_to_parent_first( GLUI_Node *parent );
00287   void      link_this_to_sibling_next( GLUI_Node *sibling );
00288   void      link_this_to_sibling_prev( GLUI_Node *sibling );
00289   void      unlink( void );
00290 
00291   void dump( FILE *out, char *name ) {
00292     fprintf( out, "GLUI_node: %s\n", name );
00293     fprintf( out, "   parent: %p     child_head: %p    child_tail: %p\n",
00294          parent_node, child_head, child_tail );
00295     fprintf( out, "   next: %p       prev: %p\n", next_sibling, prev_sibling );
00296   }
00297 
00298   GLUI_Node( void ) { 
00299     parent_node= child_head = child_tail = next_sibling = prev_sibling = NULL;
00300   }; 
00301 
00302   friend class GLUI_Rollout;
00303   friend class GLUI_Main;
00304 };

00373 /*                  Class GLUI_Bitmap                       */

00375 /************************************************************/
00376 class GLUI_Bitmap 
00377 {
00378 public:
00379   unsigned char *pixels;
00380   int            w, h;
00381   
00382   void load_from_array( int *array );
00383 
00384   GLUI_Bitmap( void ) {
00385     pixels = NULL;
00386     w      = 0;
00387     h      = 0;
00388   }
00389 };

00394 /************************************************************/
00395 /*                                                          */
00396 /*                  Class GLUI_StdBitmap                    */
00397 /*                                                          */
00398 /************************************************************/
00399 class GLUI_StdBitmaps
00400 {
00401 public:
00402   GLUI_Bitmap bitmaps[ GLUI_STDBITMAP_NUM_ITEMS ];
00403 
00404   void draw( int bitmap_num, int x, int y );
00405   
00406   GLUI_StdBitmaps( void ) {
00407     int i;
00408 
00409     for( i=0; i<GLUI_STDBITMAP_NUM_ITEMS; i++ ) {
00410       bitmaps[i].load_from_array( bitmap_arrays[i] );
00411     }
00412   }
00413 };

00477   void set_glutDialsFunc(Int2_CB f)                      {glutDialsFunc(f);};

00504 /************************************************************/
00505 /*                                                          */
00506 /*              Class for managing a GLUT window            */
00507 /*                                                          */
00508 /************************************************************/
00509 
00510 class GLUI_Glut_Window : public GLUI_Node {
00511 public:
00512   int    glut_window_id;
00513 
00514   /*********** Pointers to GLUT callthrough functions *****/
00515   void (*glut_keyboard_CB)(unsigned char, int, int);
00516   void (*glut_special_CB)(int, int, int);
00517   void (*glut_reshape_CB)(int, int);
00518   void (*glut_passive_motion_CB)(int,int);
00519   void (*glut_mouse_CB)(int,int,int,int);
00520   void (*glut_visibility_CB)(int);
00521   void (*glut_motion_CB)(int,int);
00522   void (*glut_display_CB)(void);
00523   void (*glut_entry_CB)(int);
00524 
00525   GLUI_Glut_Window( void ) {
00526     glut_display_CB         = NULL;
00527     glut_reshape_CB         = NULL;
00528     glut_keyboard_CB        = NULL;
00529     glut_special_CB         = NULL;
00530     glut_mouse_CB           = NULL;
00531     glut_motion_CB          = NULL;
00532     glut_passive_motion_CB  = NULL;
00533     glut_entry_CB           = NULL;
00534     glut_visibility_CB      = NULL;
00535     glut_window_id          = 0;
00536   };
00537 };

00622   int           num_controls;
00623 
00624   int           add_control( GLUI_Node *parent, GLUI_Control *control );
00625 
00626 
00627   /********** Constructors and Destructors ***********/
00628 
00629   GLUI_Main( void );
00630 
00631 public:
00632   GLUI_StdBitmaps  std_bitmaps;
00633   GLUI_String      window_name;
00634   RGBc             bkgd_color;
00635   float            bkgd_color_f[3];
00636 
00637   void            *font;
00638   int              curr_modifiers;
00639 
00640   void         adjust_glut_xy( int &x, int &y ) { y = h-y; };
00641   void         activate_control( GLUI_Control *control, int how );
00642   void         align_controls( GLUI_Control *control );
00643   void         restore_draw_buffer( int buffer_state );
00644   void         disactivate_current_control( void );
00645   void         draw_raised_box( int x, int y, int w, int h );
00646   void         draw_lowered_box( int x, int y, int w, int h );
00647   int          set_front_draw_buffer( void );
00648   void         post_update_main_gfx( void );
00649   void         pack_controls( void );
00650   void         close_internal( void );
00651   void         check_subwindow_position( void );
00652   void         set_ortho_projection( void );
00653   void         set_viewport( void );
00654   void         refresh( void );
00655 };

00662 /************************************************************/
00663 /*                                                          */
00664 /*       GLUI_Control: base class for all controls          */
00665 /*                                                          */
00666 /************************************************************/
00667 
00668 class GLUI_Control : public GLUI_Node {
00669 public:
00670 
00671   int             w, h;                        /* dimensions of control */
00672   int             x_abs, y_abs;
00673   int             x_off, y_off_top, y_off_bot; /* INNER margins, by which
00674                           child controls are indented */
00675   int             contain_x, contain_y; 
00676   int             contain_w, contain_h;
00677   /* if this is a container control (e.g., 
00678      radiogroup or panel) this indicated dimensions
00679      of inner area in which controls reside */
00680   int             active, active_type, can_activate;
00681   int             spacebar_mouse_click;
00682   long            user_id, type;
00683   int             is_container;  /* Is this a container class (e.g., panel) */
00684   int             alignment;
00685   GLUI_Update_CB  callback;
00686   void            *ptr_val;                              /* A pointer value */
00687   float           float_val;                               /* A float value */
00688   int             enabled;                   /* Is this control grayed out? */
00689   int             int_val;                              /* An integer value */
00690   float           float_array_val[GLUI_DEF_MAX_ARRAY];
00691   int             state;
00692   GLUI_String     name;                         /* The name of this control */
00693   GLUI_String     text;              
00694   GLUI           *glui;
00695   void           *font;
00696   int             live_type, live_inited;
00697   int             last_live_int;   /* last value that live var known to have */
00698   float           last_live_float;
00699   GLUI_String     last_live_text;
00700   float           last_live_float_array[GLUI_DEF_MAX_ARRAY];
00701   int             float_array_size;
00702 
00703   int             collapsible, is_open;
00704   GLUI_Node       collapsed_node;
00705   int             hidden; /* Collapsed controls (and children) are hidden */
00706 
00707   /*** Get/Set values ***/
00708 
00709   virtual void   set_name( char *string );
00710   virtual void   set_int_val( int new_int )         { int_val = new_int; output_live(true); };
00711   virtual void   set_float_val( float new_float )   { float_val = new_float; output_live(true); };
00712   virtual void   set_ptr_val( void *new_ptr )       { ptr_val = new_ptr; output_live(true); };
00713   virtual void   set_float_array_val( float *array_ptr );
00714 
00715   virtual float  get_float_val( void )              { return float_val; };
00716   virtual int    get_int_val( void )                { return int_val; };
00717   virtual void   get_float_array_val( float *array_ptr );
00718   
00719   virtual int mouse_down_handler( int local_x, int local_y ) 
00720     { return false; };
00721   virtual int mouse_up_handler( int local_x, int local_y, int inside )
00722     { return false; };
00723   virtual int mouse_held_down_handler( int local_x, int local_y, int inside)
00724     { return false; };
00725   virtual int key_handler( unsigned char key, int modifiers )
00726     { return false; };
00727   virtual int special_handler( int key,int modifiers )
00728     { return false; };
00729 
00730   virtual void update_size( void )     { };
00731   virtual void idle( void )            { };
00732   virtual int  mouse_over( int state, int x, int y ) { return false; };
00733   
00734   virtual void enable( void ); 
00735   virtual void disable( void );
00736   virtual void activate( int how )     { active = true; };
00737   virtual void disactivate( void )     { active = false; };
00738 
00739   void         hide_internal( int recurse );
00740   void         unhide_internal( int recurse );
00741 
00742   int          can_draw( void ) { return (glui != NULL && hidden == false); };
00743 
00744   virtual void align( void );
00745   void         pack( int x, int y );    /* Recalculate positions and offsets */
00746   void         pack_old( int x, int y );    
00747   void         draw_recursive( int x, int y );
00748   int          set_to_glut_window( void );
00749   void         restore_window( int orig );
00750   void         translate_and_draw_front( void );
00751   void         translate_to_origin( void ) 
00752     {glTranslatef((float)x_abs+.5,(float)y_abs+.5,0.0);};
00753   virtual void draw( int x, int y )=0;
00754   void         set_font( void *new_font );
00755   void        *get_font( void );
00756   int          string_width( char *text );
00757   int          char_width( char c );
00758 
00759   void         draw_name( int x, int y );
00760   void         draw_box_inwards_outline( int x_min, int x_max, 
00761                      int y_min, int y_max );
00762   void         draw_box( int x_min, int x_max, int y_min, int y_max,
00763              float r, float g, float b );
00764   void         draw_bkgd_box( int x_min, int x_max, int y_min, int y_max );
00765   void         draw_emboss_box( int x_min, int x_max,int y_min,int y_max);
00766   void         draw_string( char *text );
00767   void         draw_char( char c );
00768   void         draw_active_box( int x_min, int x_max, int y_min, int y_max );
00769   void         set_to_bkgd_color( void );
00770     
00771   void         set_w( int new_w );
00772   void         set_h( int new_w );
00773   void         set_alignment( int new_align );
00774   void         sync_live( int recurse, int draw );  /* Reads live variable */
00775   void         init_live( void );
00776   void         output_live( int update_main_gfx );        
00777   virtual void set_text( char *t )   {};
00778   void         execute_callback( void );
00779   void         get_this_column_dims( int *col_x, int *col_y, 
00780                      int *col_w, int *col_h, 
00781                      int *col_x_off, int *col_y_off );
00782   virtual int  needs_idle( void );
00783 
00784   GLUI_Control(void) {
00785     x_off          = GLUI_XOFF;
00786     y_off_top      = GLUI_YOFF;
00787     y_off_bot      = GLUI_YOFF;
00788     x_abs          = GLUI_XOFF;
00789     y_abs          = GLUI_YOFF;
00790     state          = 0;
00791     active         = false;
00792     enabled        = true;
00793     int_val        = 0;
00794     last_live_int  = 0;
00795     float_array_size = 0;
00796     sprintf( (char*)name, "Control: %p", this );
00797     float_val      = 0.0;
00798     last_live_float = 0.0;
00799     ptr_val        = NULL;
00800     glui           = NULL;
00801     w              = GLUI_DEFAULT_CONTROL_WIDTH;
00802     h              = GLUI_DEFAULT_CONTROL_HEIGHT;
00803     font           = NULL;
00804     active_type    = GLUI_CONTROL_ACTIVE_MOUSEDOWN;
00805     alignment      = GLUI_ALIGN_LEFT;
00806     is_container   = false;
00807     can_activate   = true;         /* By default, you can activate a control */
00808     spacebar_mouse_click = true;    /* Does spacebar simulate a mouse click? */
00809     live_type      = GLUI_LIVE_NONE;
00810     strcpy( (char*)text, "" );
00811     strcpy( (char*)last_live_text, "" );
00812     live_inited    = false;
00813     collapsible    = false;
00814     is_open        = true;
00815     hidden         = false;
00816 
00817     int i;
00818     for( i=0; i<GLUI_DEF_MAX_ARRAY; i++ )
00819       float_array_val[i] = last_live_float_array[i] = 0.0;
00820   };
00821 
00822   virtual ~GLUI_Control();
00823 };
00824 
00825

01197     type                  = GLUI_CONTROL_EDITTEXT;

01206     data_type             = GLUI_EDITTEXT_TEXT;
01207     substring_end         = 2;
01208     num_periods           = 0;
01209     has_limits            = GLUI_LIMIT_NONE;
01210     sel_start             = 0;
01211     sel_end               = 0;
01212     active_type           = GLUI_CONTROL_ACTIVE_PERMANENT;
01213     can_activate          = true;
01214     spacebar_mouse_click  = false;
01215     spinner               = NULL;
01216     debug                 = false;
01217     draw_text_only        = false;
01218   };

01503 /************************************************************/
01504 
01505 class GLUI_Mouse_Interaction : public GLUI_Control
01506 {
01507 public:
01508   /*int  get_main_area_size( void ) { return MIN( h-18,  */
01509   int            draw_active_area_only;
01510     
01511   int  mouse_down_handler( int local_x, int local_y );
01512   int  mouse_up_handler( int local_x, int local_y, int inside );
01513   int  mouse_held_down_handler( int local_x, int local_y, int inside );
01514   int  special_handler( int key, int modifiers );
01515   void update_size( void );
01516   void draw( int x, int y );
01517   void draw_active_area( void );
01518   
01519   /***  The following methods (starting with "iaction_") need to
01520     be overloaded  ***/
01521   virtual int  iaction_mouse_down_handler( int local_x, int local_y ) = 0;
01522   virtual int  iaction_mouse_up_handler( int local_x, int local_y, int inside )=0;
01523   virtual int  iaction_mouse_held_down_handler( int local_x, int local_y, int inside )=0;
01524   virtual int  iaction_special_handler( int key, int modifiers )=0;
01525   virtual void iaction_draw_active_area_persp( void )=0;
01526   virtual void iaction_draw_active_area_ortho( void )=0;
01527   virtual void iaction_dump( FILE *output )=0;
01528   virtual void iaction_init( void ) = 0;
01529   
01530   GLUI_Mouse_Interaction( void ) {
01531     sprintf( name, "Mouse_Interaction: %p", this );
01532     type           = GLUI_CONTROL_MOUSE_INTERACTION;
01533     w              = GLUI_MOUSE_INTERACTION_WIDTH;
01534     h              = GLUI_MOUSE_INTERACTION_HEIGHT;
01535     can_activate   = true;
01536     live_type      = GLUI_LIVE_NONE;
01537     alignment      = GLUI_ALIGN_CENTER;
01538     draw_active_area_only = false;
01539   };
01540 };

01597 class GLUI_Translation : public GLUI_Mouse_Interaction
01598 {
01599 public:
01600   int trans_type;  /* Is this an XY or a Z controller? */
01601   int down_x, down_y;
01602   float scale_factor;
01603   GLUquadricObj *quadObj;
01604   int   trans_mouse_code;
01605   float orig_x, orig_y, orig_z;
01606   int   locked;
01607 
01608   int  iaction_mouse_down_handler( int local_x, int local_y );
01609   int  iaction_mouse_up_handler( int local_x, int local_y, int inside );
01610   int  iaction_mouse_held_down_handler( int local_x, int local_y, int inside );
01611   int  iaction_special_handler( int key, int modifiers );
01612   void iaction_init( void ) {  };
01613   void iaction_draw_active_area_persp( void );
01614   void iaction_draw_active_area_ortho( void );
01615   void iaction_dump( FILE *output );
01616 
01617   void set_speed( float s ) { scale_factor = s; };
01618 
01619   void setup_texture( void );
01620   void setup_lights( void );
01621   void draw_2d_arrow( int radius, int filled, int orientation ); 
01622   void draw_2d_x_arrows( int radius );
01623   void draw_2d_y_arrows( int radius );
01624   void draw_2d_z_arrows( int radius );
01625   void draw_2d_xy_arrows( int radius );
01626 
01627   int  get_mouse_code( int x, int y );
01628 
01629   /* Float array is either a single float (for single-axis controls),
01630      or two floats for X and Y (if an XY controller) */
01631 
01632   float get_z( void ) {     return float_array_val[0];  }
01633   float get_x( void ) {     return float_array_val[0];  }
01634   float get_y( void ) {
01635     if ( trans_type == GLUI_TRANSLATION_XY )    return float_array_val[1];
01636     else                    return float_array_val[0];
01637   }
01638 
01639   void  set_z( float val );
01640   void  set_x( float val );
01641   void  set_y( float val );
01642   void  set_one_val( float val, int index );
01643 
01644   GLUI_Translation( void ) {
01645     locked              = GLUI_TRANSLATION_LOCK_NONE;
01646     sprintf( name, "Translation: %p", this );
01647     type                = GLUI_CONTROL_TRANSLATION;
01648     w                   = GLUI_MOUSE_INTERACTION_WIDTH;
01649     h                   = GLUI_MOUSE_INTERACTION_HEIGHT;
01650     can_activate        = true;
01651     live_type           = GLUI_LIVE_FLOAT_ARRAY;
01652     float_array_size    = 0;
01653     alignment           = GLUI_ALIGN_CENTER;
01654     trans_type          = GLUI_TRANSLATION_XY;
01655     scale_factor        = 1.0;
01656     quadObj             = NULL;
01657     trans_mouse_code    = GLUI_TRANSLATION_MOUSE_NONE;
01658   };
01659 };
